name: Master of All Skills
author: 触手动漫
content: [Unique Trait Skill Master &#40EX&#41 has been activated.] &quotWhoa… your skill’s insane!&quot[Skill has been copied.]With the power to copy any ability he witnesses, Yoo Ju-yeon embarks on a legendary journey to the top — outsmarting rivals, outshining heroes, and collecting every skill in existence!
